shortdesc.i: As a Card, request the navigator to perform a peek on the deck.

dd.p: Describes the type of peek to perform as a peek to the content of the parent or a peek to the content of the root. The value should be either "content" or "root".

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    function peekParent() {
        // Request the navigator to perform a peek to the content of the parent
        document.addEventListener('touchstart', function(event) {
            blackberry.invoked.cardStartPeek("content");
        }, false);
    }

</script>
